meanings.definition: To convey or express emotion through gestures or facial expressions.
meanings.sent1: She emotes happiness by smiling brightly.
meanings.sent2: He often emotes his excitement through animated gestures.
meanings.sent3: The actor emotes sadness on stage with convincing tears.
meanings.sent4: The painting emotes a sense of tranquility through the serene expressions.
meanings.sent5: The singer emotes passion with every note she sings.

meanings.definition: A small digital image or icon used to represent an emotion or action in online communication.
meanings.sent1: She sent an emotes of a heart to express her love.
meanings.sent2: The chat was filled with various emotes to convey different emotions.
meanings.sent3: The emotes of the funny faces always make me laugh.
meanings.sent4: His collection of emotes added color to his messages.
meanings.sent5: The emotes of animals are so cute and expressive.
